title: 2026 Latvian state budget passed at last
summary_full: At the conclusion of two days of debate, Latvia's parliament, the Saeima, on the evening of December 4th managed to pass the 2026 budget.
summary_public: At the conclusion of two days of debate, Latvia's parliament, the Saeima, on the evening of December 4th managed to pass the 2026 budget.

LV.label: neutral
